question.para: Why does less (and therefore man) print <AD> instead of hyphens?

answer.para: Because the LANG and LC_ALL environment variables aren't set. To fix that, set them in the ~/.bashrc file for each user or in /etc/profile by adding lines like this: export LANG=en_US export LC_ALL=en_US
Those lines can be added to /etc/profile with the following command: echo -e 'export LANG=en_US\nexport LC_ALL=en_US' >> /etc/profile
You'll have to change the "en_US" part if you don't use US English.
